title: Define authorization boundary for server routes
actions: Locate existing auth middleware/guards and document intended boundary
Add route guard checks or middleware wiring where missing
notes: Auth wiring not evidenced in provided inputs
missing_inputs: Repo paths containing current auth middleware or route guards (e.g., src/server/auth/**)
CLI help output for oraclepack validate/run/actionize (if already exists)

title: Bound upload persistence metadata and retention policy
actions: Add explicit retention policy + max entries/size controls
Ensure metadata captured is sufficient for downstream analysis
